documents.document:
Trial exam is coming soon

Actually now most of skol having trial exam, but my skol not yet having trial exam bcoz d trial exam is on next month lo...
Why!!!!
This is bcoz my teacher especially chem n bio not yet teach finish d syllabus on topic that we should learn.. so some topic we hv to learn our own...
no matter hw, i hope that i really can answer d question on my trial exam... hope i can achieve my target on trial exam...
Tis week i do some revision maths (paper 1), inorganic chem n bio (volume 2)...
but still not finish d revision...
Anyway, i hope that i can do it!!!

At this moment.. i'm relax...

Today my trial exam is over lo.. i feel very relax at tis moment....
but i still hv to continue to do my revision too....
i think that my trial exam would not achieve a good result.... but i still hv to improved it...
so hv to make sure i can do well on my real exam....
Tis week i really very tired n not enough to sleep.... bcoz no enough to study all d topic in certain subject....
really don't noe hw to study well on my weak subject....
i really try hard for it but my memory is not so good..
how lo..................
i must think positive n no matter wat i hv to do it..

The lesson that i attend...

After trial exam is over, we all feel very relax but still hv to study at school...
Nothing interesting things happen today in my class.... most student just chatting each other... but some students absent... maybe they feel tired n think that no necessary to present!!! Actually they right, can rest at home lo......
But something bad thing happen to my fren, are u want to noe wat is happened from her, let me tell u lo....
I call that d girl is YLin, today she early come to skol n tell us that her maths paper haven't passed up yet.... .. actually maths exam is yesterday 1!!!!
But YLin thought that she already passed up d maths paper... she was very shock when she reach home bcoz her maths paper still on her hand!!
She was very afraid that d maths paper still can passed up or not!! we also don't noe lo... She look like wan to cry .....
no matter hw, tis problem already solved lo!!

today i also attend d seminar PA.... d teacher quite good in teaching but i still hv little confused.... but anyway i hv to do more revision about it...

(^_^)..Holiday...(-_-)

Tis week is my school holiday but i noe that tis weel oso d Hari Raya Aidifitri...so most of malay will celebrate it...
I already plan my study's time table.. hope i really can follow d time to study well 4 subject lo....
D stpm exam is coming soon....
i really very stress n tension....
but i still can manage it....
just i afraid that i can't achieve d target that wat i wanted.....
Actually i really very hardworking to study n do revision... but still can't achieve a good result... just d common answer that u will said that may be u not prepare well on ur study or no understood d lesson that u learn..
i always tell to myself that u can do it...n sure can achieve a good result... but...look like it is not so effect.....
"hard'....'difficult'...on ur question paper??
sometimes v don't noe or not understood d question on exam paper...
Now i really tired....
want to rest a bit lo....
open my mind to think...
wat should i do??
Tomoro, tomoro n tomoro....
time is shorten for me....
no much time 4 me to relax n rest lo...
hope i use tis holiday to prepare well my study....
Try my best...don't give up...

Learn

Now holiday is finish, i hv to go to school start from next week..
Actually now i really no study well on my study....now i'm very worried for it..
I learn for something n then do revision for one topic...really take very long period of time to study all...now still no yet finish...i will going to cry liao...
I don't know that why i study very slow besides the time no enough 4 me..
Now i'm hvn't time to study all topic on one subject...besides i hv 4 subject to study.. i really very nervous....
Wat should i do??
now i only prepare well for my PA n maths subject...
so i hv confident 4 it...
Day after day...just leave 4 several week 4 me to study...
so afraid lo....
Stpm exam is really hard to me....
really don't noe hw to do well on my exam...
just can try my best to do well....
i now try to persuade me that i can do it n don't give up...
like that i can continue to study....

no matter hw, i think that wat i done now is enough to achieve a good result...
just scared that i easily to forgot wat i learn from d knowledge.....

27 Nov 2007

Today i not go to skol lo.. bcoz no much time to do my revision....if i go to skol, just waste my time only...bcoz after school hour, i hv to wait bus about 1 hour to reach home...in addition no one want to fetch me home...they all live another place n no one same wit me....so pity...
So today i do my study plan....to do revision 4 maths n organic chem..
in one day v can't just do same subject...bcoz like that v will feel so boring...
so i do two differebt subject in one day... hope i can study finish 4 tis two subject...
especially mahts paper 1 n all chapter in organic chem ( d route map that i do)..

Now i must believe that i can do better on real exam....do more exercise n be confident to myself....
The trial exam, i not do so well bcoz d result is too bad 4 me... so i don't want to mention about it lo ..
but nvm lo....still hv time to do study well...
i will do d correction 4 my exam paper n noe d mistake that wat i did....
so, i just keep on to do well lo...
no else i do now.....
just study smart.....

My real exam.....

just about 18 days 4 me.... i so scared n nervous....
bcoz i not prepare well on my study especially bio n chem....
no matter hw, i just do some exercise 4 tis two subject...
Hope i can get benefit from it...
Actually i very stress that i afraid that i can't do well on my real exam which will coming soon...
just hv to study smart at the limited time for four subject
i hv to jia you lo..
try hard to do well lo...
no much time lo...
ok....i stop write here......

Apply Universiti.....

Last Tuesday i already take my stpm result lo.....d result still ok lo...i really x think that my pa get A lo...but oso unhappy my math result bcoz x get A lo....other subject still ok lo.....
After take d result, i very confuse to chose my course on ipta...
i worry that course i wan will compete with other stpm student...although if compare to stpm student 2007, this year really few student to study stpm lo.....but i still scared n worry....
i already apply d form lo...n hv x chance 2 change my course lo bcoz kemaskini is end liao...
hope my decision is correct n x be regret lo...ok lo....
i x wan think about d course liao...if can enter U, i really happy lo...but hv to my interest course... if x my interest course, still can go to complain lo....if can't, i think deeply wether d course provided by U isn't suitable me to study lo...
I must be happy bcoz i already apply d form.. just continue to do my work lo.....
I x wan think so much....waste my time only.....

Be primary teacher...

After my stpm exam, i go to work as temporary primary teacher in chinese skol lo...
From begining, i think that i can teaching in some class but is different 4 my thinking..
i noe that most ppl think that if become teacher will teaching...
but for me, just a half clerk n half teacher.....tis feeling not so good....my mood is very bad...
i go to skol n just sit in the office, very boring lo.... d penolong kanan pertama (PK1) arrange d work 4 me lo...
i really hate her lo... my result x so bad lo... i really can teach... why she arrange just do some typind document in office n oso replace some teacher who go to meeting or some important appointment lo..
i replace d teacher n go to d class, can't teaching lo n just sit there....warning student x be so noisy..
i work as teacher to get some experience that to practise hw to teach student to understand d some theory in texbook... i wan to noe that wether i can teach or not????
can't feel d teaching's experience lo....so bad lo...
My friend oso same wit me lo.... she wan to quit d work lo.... but PK1 x allow lo.... she give many excuse for us... bcoz d skol really x enough teacher lo....
but they treat us like that.... can't learn something n just sit in office do nothing....boring lo....
so i can't quit d work lo....so hv to wait until 3 month later....
after tis, i go to study University liao....
i better go to study rather than work there..
next time if i wan to be temporary teacher, i will x chose d skol liao.....
bcoz all is PK1 false... she want us help her to do report..... her work pass to us do lo...
Haizz......

My today is bad day...

Today i follow my sister go to do temporary passport in Port Klg.. bcoz her company hv organise to travel to Thailand lo...
We come there very early but her manager so late coming lo...he coming about 9 o'clock lo..
I really x like person come late lo....hv to punctually on that time... let us wait about 1 hour lo...
So that i very angry lo, bcoz i be a temporary teacher can't take off day accept got m/c letter lo...
So i hv to go back to skol teaching lo... i really hate d PK1 lo...
My dad is so kind n wait until me do finish d pasport lo...
He laying to his boss said that my grandfather hv to go to hospital...
bcoz he wait me lo...
I finish d passport about 11o'clock n then go to work...
Haizz, anyway just let me know that next time i x wan go wit my sister if her company organise trip again....

Ujian MEdSI

Today i attend ujian MEdSI, i got little nervous lo....bcoz i don't know that what kind of question will come out...n nothing to study... just depend ur behaviour..see whether u suitable to be a teacher lo....
I go to SMK Batu Unjur to attend test...
There are 148 ppl will come to attend d test lo...
Firstly i go to d dewan take d test..
Then i search my place n sit down... to wait d time starting lo....
In dewan, x so many ppl coming take d test lo.... many empty place o...
There just few chinese ppl take d ujian lo.....
i don't know that is good news for us or x ?
but v hv to depend our good luck lo...
If pass, v hv to go to interview o....
This is another challenge lo..but someone said that it is difficult lo....
i hv to do more homework...if i pass it lo...
so just wish me good luck....

Holiday

I'm boring lo...
x noe doing wat o...
always just watching TV, reading book n listen music...
n sometimes online lo..
but also boring lo...
Haizz...............

The SSPN....

?????? SSPN (Skim Simpanan Pendidikan Nasional)? CIMB Bank....
??????????.... ?????????????????????... ??????....?????????, ??????????????
??????????? ???????????
?????????? ?? relax lo... x need think it again lo...
???????????? ????????
?? SSPN ??????? ???????? ptptn, ???? SSPN???
??????????
?????? ptptn???? SSPN?? close account...
?????????????????
????? ???????????? ??????????

Go to Universiti Malaysia Terengganu (UMT)

From start 18/6/08, we can start checking our result that whether v got enter Universiti?
That day, i very afraid lo bcoz if x enter U, i x noe that when i should go to study lo....
Luckily, i get my 3rd choice, that is Food Technology in UMT o...
Actually i wan to chose UPM but i think that must be hv a big competition lo..
Almost my fren also chose the UPM o....
Why i x get 1st n 2nd choice..? This is bcoz i got chosed education in UPM on my 1st choice n also education in UPSI on my 2nd choice...
Tis two choice i x get lo...
Bcoz the education got requirement lo..that are hv to take Ujian Medsi and also after u pass the ujian Medsi, then u can go to interview lo...
so in my conclusion, i din't pass the ujian Medsi lo...
But nvm lo...
Begining, when i noe that i will go to UMT, i got little happy lo...
but unhappy is no one same with me go to UMT.... that time i really feel very alone o....
bcoz most of my fren go to UMS in Sabah lo... about 6 ppl lo....
My other fren got UPM, other 3 fren got UM lo... some of my fren go to UUM in Kedah lo...
After that, my best fren, lin may come to my hse and tell my mum that she got in UMT... that time i x at hse..go to my yee wei's hse lauch internet lo... bcoz i wan to accept the offer letter lo...
In 17/6 n 18/6, i can't lauch net in my hse o... bcoz my area hse's telephone got problem lo...
After i back home, my mum tell that lin may same U with me... that time i feel very happy lo..bocz i got one fren go with me in UMT
Go to University, hv to do many things such as cop the document n oso d prepare necessary daily things lo....
but this at all, i done finish lo...
So tonight i will go to Terengganu study lo...
i go with my mum and sister , lin may and lin may's dad o... by bus...
so i will start my school's life lo...in my University..

I already in UMT lo..

Last week i attended the orientation which is organised by Senior UMT lo..
From start, before i come to lapor myself, i x noe that there got bus UMT provided to send us go to Dewan Sultan Mizan lo..
so i hv to tell my cousin that she x need come to fetch us go to UMT lo...
we reach in UMT about 7-8 hour lo... so long..n very cool in the bus lo....
i tin we reach at Dewan Sultan Mizan (DSM) at about 5 o'clock at morning.
but v hv to wait about 8 o'clock then will start register in counter lo...
But is x good thing is v hv to go up stairs at fourth floor... so tired if everyday hv to go the room after back from skol o...
but luckily my roomate all are very kind person lo.... in the room got 4 ppl stay lo.. quite sempit lo in the one room lo...
i very x happy about my room lo... bcoz hard to study in the room..
In addition, my room quite hot lo...
anyway, i hv to continue to study hard my course lo...

My today lesson

Today i attend Engeering Mathematics, i learn the set n numbers.. tis lesson that i already learn in form six lor.. still can hander lor... x quite hard..
My lecturer is Cik Madhihah...she always give us homework after she teach finish a subtopic lesson..
but still ok lo.. what is she teaching...i quite understand lo..
but some question i x noe hw to do o...
After tis lesson, i got organic chemistry lor. the lady lecturer teach so fast lo.... just go through the topic...
haiz... but nvm la... i can read note on myself lor...
after all tis lesson, i'm very free lo..
just do homework and lauch internet lor..
quite boring lor.. but hv to patient n wait my holiday which is coming soon on next month...
so that i can back my hometown o...

Today lesson...

At 8.00am i hv to attend the Tamadun Islam and Tamadun Asia lor...
The lecturer quite funny lor... but i feel little wan to sleep o.... bcoz tis subject really x link about my course..
haiz..until now i x yet study about my course lo..
I just learn Engineering Mathematis, hubungan etnik, basic biochemistry...
Actually x cover about my course.. i take course is food tech... must know n learn some basic knowledge about food tech lor.. bcoz i x noe that what subject hv to study inside the food tech lor..
But most important i wan to bring my stpm book from my hometown to study lor....
all tis book can refresh wat v learn b4 lo.. but now i x hv tis book lor.... hv to study o...?
i hv to be patient n wait until next month holiday to back my hometown lor...
Anyway i just read that note which provided by lecturer but the note x so good bcoz too simple n x very clear about the theory lor..
i just hope that i can pass my test which given by lecturer lor... but i x noe that when test will start lor..?
ok, i stop write here..

My exam is coming soon

This is my 1st semester final exam which is coming soon..
So i hv to study hard to get a good result..
But i hv mny things to study.. now i study the understanding computer.. hv about 5 chapter hv to do revision.. sometimes feel very sleepy to study it.. it is too mny things wan to absord d knowledge...
anyway, still hv to study it.....
so gambateh lor..

Back hometown

Tomoro is my last final exam, then i can go home lor..
So excited..
I hope that i can meet my friends in my hometown especially my friend who study in UMS..
I think that maybe hv mny topic to chat when i meet there about their study life in their University..
Today i hv to do revision subject hubungan etnik..
This subject hv to study about the perpaduan and also hubungan harmonis antara kaum in our Malaysia..
Actually the main purpose is the want to maintain the good relationship between different race in Malaysia..
Anyway, there have a lot things to study..
but i really that tis subject i can done well in exam..
so gambateh lor...
